attachBehavior ( $  name,
$  behavior 
) [inherited]

Attaches a behavior to this component.

Calls the Yii implementation of this method, then injects the behaviors methods into our class.

Parameters:
string $name The behavior's name. It should uniquely identify this behavior.
mixed $behavior the behavior configuration. This is passed as the first parameter to YiiBase::createComponent to create the behavior object.
Returns:
IBehavior the behavior object

Definition at line 410 of file CXLConfig.php.

jsonDecode ( $  json,
$  assoc = null,
$  depth = null 
) [inherited]

Decodes a JSON string http://php.net/manual/en/function.json-decode.php.

Parameters:
string $json

The json string being decoded.

Parameters:
bool $assoc [optional]

When true, returned objects will be converted into associative arrays.

Parameters:
int $depth [optional]

User specified recursion depth.

Returns:
mixed the value encoded in json in appropriate PHP type. Values true, false and null (case-insensitive) are returned as true, false and respectively. is returned if the json cannot be decoded or if the encoded data is deeper than the recursion limit.

Definition at line 200 of file CXLConfig.php.

jsonEncode ( $  jsonOptions = null  )  [inherited]

Returns the JSON representation of a value http://php.net/manual/en/function.json-encode.php.

Parameters:
mixed $value

The value being encoded. Can be any type except a resource.

This function only works with UTF-8 encoded data.

Parameters:
int $options [optional]

Bitmask consisting of JSON_HEX_QUOT, JSON_HEX_TAG, JSON_HEX_AMP, JSON_HEX_APOS, JSON_FORCE_OBJECT.

Returns:
string a JSON encoded string on success.
